name: A Haunted Jaunt
description:
This game is my first stealth game about a cowardly cat guy named John Lemon,  He Was dared by his rival to stay in a haunted house and escape it before dawn.  John is just a simple cat kid, he can't really run very fast nor does he have psychic powers.  But he is pretty good at sneaking, and apparently Blob rabbits love him..  Not to eat or anything but as a friend kind of way.

Features:

Sneak through 3 levels to prove that you are (probably )brave!

No fancy health mechanics or fancy detection meters, if you are caught, you have to try again, that's all.

You are not alone, you get a cute little  slime rabbit who will occasionally point out a safer path to help you on your way. More features will be added with her, by the way her name is Babble.

Beware of Jimbob...
